REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0088 reute r f BC-DATACORPY-<DCPY>-IN-P 03-03 0073

TEXT.TITLE: DATACORPY <DCPY> IN PACT WITH XEROX <XRX>
TEXT.BODY:
Datacopy Corp said it has signed a joint marketing agreement for its Model 730 office image scanner with Xerox Corp. Under the pact, Xerox sales force will reference-sell the scanner as its choice for desktop publishing applications. Datacopy will supply Xerox with technical support and respond to customer orders within 30 days of the purchase order.
Reuter
